name: Soultern
description:
You got a second chance to live

But your soul is forever bound to your lantern

Defeat the Guardian of the Underworld Time Space and get out with your precious Soultern!

Or are you going to be  stuck between the Living and the Death for the rest of you life? But don't you worry. You got your one and only Soultern!

  • Who you can not leave for too long or you'll die
  • With whom you mustn't fight or you'll break your Soultern and die also!
  • Who feeds off the monsters'  souls
  • Who is your greatest burden you can ever have!
  • Who is your light and a little warmth as well (if you're not cold-hearted that is)

Your soul is forever with you, yet  never within you

A submission for GMTK Game Jam - Joined Together

We recommend downloading Soultern since it's laggy on the browser

Made by:

Michael - programming and programming

Eskymak - art, music, level design 

Denitoo - help with the concept
